name: A New Hand Tocuhes The Beacon
name_original: A New Hand Tocuhes The Beacon
description:
Made for Untitled Game Jam 73

Three levels of mirror spinning puzzles. I will say that I might do more in future, but let's face it, I probably won't....

Controls

Move: A/D - or - Left Arrow/Right Arrow

Jump: W - or - Up Arrow

Rotate Clockwise: E

Rotate Anti-Clockwise: Q
